Blog.post: Anjelica ERin and I went to universal it was sooooooo much fun. we went to the islands of adventure woohoo!!
camp wasn't that bad !! For once. and joe's sister likes the bridesmaid dress so that is pretty cool. I am glad. Other than that same olddddddddd
urlLink me urlLink
Me urlLink

Erin and i went to Daytona and no joke 30 minutes on the beach and the lighting started. At least we went shopping and ate at a very good seafood restuarant. It was a very fun day!!! Tomorrow is campppppppppp it will suck as usual but i have a better horoscope for tomorrow read about the arts!! Today you are likely to be looking especially beautiful and sexy, darlene and are likely to be feeling particularly passionate. Communication with romantic partners, however, is likely to be blocked. Don't feel rejected. You'll be in the same space tomorrow, and you could get lucky then! Your interest in the arts is also high. Channel some of that passion into learning about them. It may not be the same, but it should do for now!

Ahora quién si no soy yo Me miro y lloro en el espejo y me siento estúpido Ilógico, y luego te imagino toda regalando el olor de tu piel Tus besos, tu sonrisa eterna y hasta el alma en un beso En un beso va el alma Y en mi alma está el beso que pudo ser What a great song !!! Went to the pool today with the boys. Got some sun and went to walmart to get some tubs for my pocketbook so fun.

After fighthing with john and aaron aboutwhat movie to see! Garfield or the stepford wives. WE saw the stepford wives. It was quite good! Christ John thinks he knows everything!! It is about time to deflate his ego. Friday I was a gay taxi driver since aaron's car is still in the shop!! I have had this duty for the past three weeks. I went to PF Changs with ERin and Joe! Joe was being a stresball. I had fun nonetheless.
JENN IS NOW A TAN PERSON FOR THE FIRST TIME IN HER PASTY IRISH LIFE WAY TO GO JENN AND THE BOTTLE OF BRONZER.

NO Universal for me today b/c of AARON. I could of went to NY !!! WE may go bowling we'll see the gay mind changes rapidly. Other than that Peanut got some shit stuck on his little butt. What a thrusday!!!
You can hardly make a friend in a year, but you can easily offend one in an hour." -- Chinese Proverb

Went to the ale house with the girls it was fun!!! I was so happy to see Sheri and the baby. Well another day with Aaron pissed at me for no reason !!! I don't understand gay men i don't. Lindsay never came to visit!! I am glad that my parents are coming here soon though that made my day. They come next week YIPEEE
FIRE STICKS !!! After her encounter with a nasty mexician dish . LOL

I wake up in the morning, >And can hardly wait to see >If I've received a mailing, >addressed from you to me. > >I get my 'puter running >And much to my delight, >Your poems, jokes and other things >Come quickly into sight. > >Please keep those emails coming, >They are so enjoyable you see >Funny things, friendly things >Those things you mail to me. > >But most of all the fun of it, >Is knowing that they came. >From you, my friend, >The one I need not name.

Yippee today is my friday then i don't work for the next five days. Isn't that great! The WB superstars were so funny last night! Maybe i can win 100,000 for singing great. Damint! Why does it has to be to be the worst singer in the land Horoscope time: If someone insists on having things their own way, let them, darlene. Fighting over it is not going to do any good. This kind of reaction will only cause more tension between you. Approaching the situation with a hostile attitude will most likely result in a lose-lose scenario. If arguments do arise, try not to take things personally. Try your best to stick with the facts. Looks Like someone is going to give me a problem today!! Lindsay wants to come down and stay over but Joe has the most pressure filled week of his life and i really shouldn't have people over at all. What should i do??
Cat is my favorite sorority sister who introduced me to the blog site. Kudos to her for being just sooooooo cool and fashion savy!! She needs a nice catholic man. I SEE one in her future.

to email or not to email that is a question? !! The camp sucked. They forgot my equipment but i got out of an hour of work hurrah!!! The kids were really responsive especially the boys. But who knows what the boys were really thinking. I almost got picked up at Mcdonalds on my lunch break by two scary black men. HELLO doesn't anyone see the ring on my finger Christ!
The coach store outlet now has the signature collection. Isn't that awesome. check it out www.coach.com

I don't want to go to camp tomorrow. I really don't. I want to enjoy my vacation. I need the extra money for the wedding by i really don't wanna go especially with what my horoscope says for tomorrow. HERE it is.... Light is being shed on cold hard facts that you may have been trying to avoid for quite some time, darlene. There is no sense trying to pretend that you do not see the truth that is staring you square in the face. Just because you may not want to accept what you see doesn't mean that you can carry on with the belief that it simply does not exist. This is one of those times when you must face the music, whether you like it or not. From MSN HOROSCOPES: WHY ME!!! I hope it doesn't really suck tomorrow . Or the truth will be that it will suck. I hate Mondays
urlLink This is my puppy peanut when he was a little baby. He just had his first birthday the other day. Peanut is a Yorkie. He only weighs 5 pounds. Happy Birthday P!!! urlLink

A few nights ago I went to pleasure island with a few friends from school. I drank a bucket of punch. It was not good the next day but I had fun doing the kickline for the song New York, New York and closing PI at 200 am.
I went to the Lava Lounge with Aaron and John last night it was so fun. I love hanging out with cute gay men. Although getting picked up by spanish ladies was werid.

Hello It has been a very stressful few days. hallelujah for the camp being over i deserve the check coming to me!!! The kids were really rough the last two days of camp. The house has driven me to drink b/c everything hasn't been moving as planned but hopefully soon we can move in!! I went to school and my nerves gotthe best of me. How will these teachers respond to me this year at least I have friends now so it an be a little easier but really how will they respond. the second year is tough alot pressure is on me. How about the wedding that is going swell!! LOL! At least the summer was excellent much better than last year and I had alot of fun seeing Orlando finally. School starts Monday the journey starts again!! By the way Please vote John KERRY fpr president after 911 i really feel that we need a new leader to run this country!

I went to downtown Orlando and it was crazy. Chruch street is loaded with hundreds of bars and clubs. I think I went to like 5 different places with no cover. That is an added bonus. I had alot of fun with kristy and erin. Kristy and I were saying in the taxicab home that we are just too old for this and we are. I had a guy with a full load of gold metal teeth tell me in his drunkness that I was being mean . thenwe had a gay guy say how fab we all were. Funny night but i am glad to be getting married soon. IT was a long drive to good old sanford last night!! LOL

W h en you hear the name jelly roll do you think donuts. well my friends you are wrong jelly rolls is a piano bar in disney and I had so much fun there . they had almost every sing along you can imagine. It was great! I am glad that i am cooming into my own with my new friends erin and kristy they are so funny and I am glad that they work with me at school.

What a boring Sunday!! I got the new marron 5 cd it is great !Apparently they came out of five towns college . That is a miracle considering how shady five towns is!! Nothing really new going on this weekend except for packing and doing stuff for our marriage preparation in the church. One question on our 200 question compablity test from the church was..... do you have homosexual tendencies? Strange the catholic church. School is almost two weeks ago and I am scared yet again of the upcoming new year. I hope that this year will be even more excellent than last year. Horoscope time...... Today you're likely to put a lot of energy into your romantic relationship, dear Scorpio. The astral energy is encouraging you to focus on romance. Consider giving your significant other a special gift to show how much you care, and spending time alone together. Any romance initiated or advanced today is likely to prove stable and long lasting, so don't let fear stand in your way. Move ahead!

VH-1 90 show is so funny and has brought back a ton of memories from junior high and high school. i have been so lazy this week and have been packing too. I need to buy school clothes since it starts very soon boo hoo!! Nothing really too new today. So far the wedding is going at the pace that I want it to go yipee!!

I officially have removed Lindsay from the wedding. She has to many fiancial issues and has lied to me too many times. i emailed matt but still haven't heard from him. I may purchase his bands new release!! The house closing is getting close I am very excited. Camp was the usual today I like tuesday better than Thrusday.

Well it was a good business trip to NY. I still have to get the photographer and the florist but so far so good. I got the music that is what counts!!! I still think i need medication for my anxiety worry worry that is all that i do. Tomorrow is Matt's birthday!!! I think i may contact him. I went to the hamptons last night it was pretty fun I hadn't dance in a while and Jenn's crazy antics always make the night great. WEll camp tomorrow you know how i feel about that

So excited that I finally got a DJ for the wedding. This DJ rocks and they did Meadow or Jamie Lynn Seiglers wedding!! Kick ASS!!! So far my New York experience is much better than I anticipated. Back home to FL tomorrow . I am so glad that the new house looks so cute!!!

well it first started at the orlando aiport my welcoming to NY i mean. A lady decided that she would just cut me for no apparent reason while there was no line. I was so mad I was like lady you suck!! I had three bags in oner of the bags was peanut so i had a heavy load to carry. On the plane the flight attendant kindly told one gentleman to shut off his phone for departure. He replied i know you jack ass. Sweet huh. whnen we landed the plane rolled to the ground which in lamens terms was flying kind of unbalanced So i thought we where going to crash. What else hmm... Joe didn't even know what flight I was on or plane cute huh! ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!! I think i need anxiety medication i am actually sure i do. When my insurance is fixed i am going to the doctor in fl and get some. Today will suck for sure! why can't NY be fun and not suck so badly.

NYCCCCCCCCCCCC mean something to me!! I am going home to NY to start getting vendors for my upcoming wedding in March. So exciting right! I don't think so. Camp suck today and was cancelled yesterday. But i was still mad anyway !! I have cramps so that is not fun !! GRRRRRR I want chocolate!!!

Of course Florida kept it's deal with a crazy thunderstorm, with rainbow at the same time 400pm and lasting till the evening. My computer got hit with lighting which erased my entire hard drive. So i wasn't too happy about that. the only thing that made me happy yesterday was that i bought Gucci perfume and it smelled nice. I hope today is better but hell it is camp day how it it be.

Happy soon to be the 4th of July. This week has been the most intense week of my little life. I am in the process of purchasing a home and planning my wedding. Talk about a freakin anxiety attack. Joe and I are planning to move to Orlando hopefully in our first home. It is so exciting I hope everything works out. I have a wonderful time with my parents and Anjelica. I am still not to happy with Aaron he asks to many questions and it drives me nuts!!!! he is dying to know if Joe has a job so that he can tell John. John is very competitive. GRRR. WELL LET THE MOVING PROCESS Begin out of this hell hole Sanford FL.

WEll the hurricane season is upon us in Florida and I have no school today Yippee. Sad though b/c we won't have off the day before thanks giving!! But awesome anyway cuz I was tired this week! The kids were good and bad I found myself feeling better about teaching and not so afraid like last year. the house is at a standstill until next week. i would rather close next week than do it today Friday the 13th !! EERie

unreal that school is starting and i feel so unprepared but confident that everything will work out. This week was crazy! I went downtown with erin and kristy and i had so much fun. we went to a bar call Lattitudes it was on top of a building with Tiki torches surrounding it. very neat! Other than that the house closing is at a stand still and I got my first communion today! Joe and i can get married in a catholic church now that is exciting !
